languages.custom: understands Celestial but utters only obscene nonsense

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 6d6 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] casts [[lookup @item.name]].

The atropal targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 19 format=long]], taking [[/damage 8d8 type=necrotic average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The atropal regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The atropal summons a wraith, which materializes within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The wraith obeys its summoner’s commands and can’t be controlled by any other creature. The wraith vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points or when its summoner dies.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The atropal can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The atropal regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Touch. The atropal makes a touch attack.

Ray of &Reference[cold]{Cold} (Costs 2 Actions). The atropal uses its Ray of &Reference[cold]{Cold}.

Wail (Costs 3 Actions). The atropal lets out a withering wail. Any creature within 120 feet of the atropal that can hear the wail must succeed on a [[/save con 19 format=long]] or gain 1 level of &Reference[exhaustion]{exhaustion}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The atropal uses its Ray of &Reference[cold]{Cold}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The atropal lets out a withering wail. Any creature within 120 feet of the atropal that can hear the wail must succeed on a [[/save con 19 format=long]] or gain 1 level of &Reference[exhaustion]{exhaustion}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Magic Resistance. The atropal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Negative Energy Aura. Creatures within 30 feet of the atropal can’t regain hit points, and any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the atropal takes [[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

If the atropal is struck by a vorpal sword, the wielder can cut the atropal’s umbilical cord instead of dealing damage. If its umbilical cord is cut, the atropal loses this feature.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Turn Resistance Aura. The atropal and any other &Reference[undead]{undead} creature within 30 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns &Reference[undead]{undead}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
